name: minne
tagline: A simple self-hosted budgeting tool for personal finance
description: Minne is a simple self-hosted budgeting tool designed for personal finance tracking. It supports categories, transaction entry, and charts, with a fully responsive and clean user interface.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: View spending patterns and budget performance with interactive charts and graphs

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Create custom expense categories with color coding and spending limit alerts

features.title: Monthly Reports
features.description: Generate detailed financial reports showing income, expenses, and savings trends

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set financial goals and track progress with visual indicators and milestone notifications

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, mobile-friendly interface that works seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over sensitive financial information
